Text.Page: After discovering devas at Mags Kulkar, you defeated Gutrend Chief Krashar and retrieved a Lok token. Now you have proof that the devas and the Scions of Lok are somehow involved with the recent Gutrend invasion.

Gutrends are not usually this aggressive—we've never had them take out an entire village before.

Lisadore has been observing them in their territory. She may have some information by now if you can find her.

Sozia sent you out here, did she? Good. My scout Ethia reported that the Gutrends might have some sort of special weapons.

Take out a few of the Gutrend {@LinkCreature:6#2061#sentries} and {@LinkCreature:6#2051#reapers}. Let's see if we can find anything unusual.

These look like ordinary kulkari sticks and stones to me.

Ethia's scouting around Mags Kulkari, due south from here. See if you can figure out what she's on about.

Let's look at weapons from a different group this time.

Bring them from the Gutrend {@LinkCreature:6#2061#sentries} and {@LinkCreature:6#2051#reapers}.

Well, if she read the reports I've been sending...

What I said was, I've seen kulkari moving a lot of heavy {@LinkObject:33#crates} into Mags Kulkar. My guess is it's weapons, and not those stone things they're using now.

Break open a few and bring me some proof."You want the weapons?"

Yes, and find {@LinkCreature:6#7031#Krashar}, the chief. He'll know where those crates are coming from.

Of course, I doubt he'll tell you voluntarily...
Devas? The crates were full of devas? And Krashar's dead? Fine with me, as long as you got the information I need.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"This is what I found."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

A crest? I don't know of any Gutrend crests...

It's one of Lok's! The Gutrends aren't associated with Lok—or, they weren't.

Hurry. Vindicator Camp needs to know that devas and Scions of Lok are involved with the Gutrends! Take this to Crevan there.
Have you found anything? We have to find out what's going on!

A crest of Lok! You found this on Krashar? That's...well, that's very odd.

I'm not entirely sure what it means. But I intend to find out.
Have you found out anything about those Gutrends?
